document.full_text: syrian security forces shot dead 11 mourners in the central city of homs on saturday at a mass funeral for people killed in the latest crackdown on protests against president bashar al-assad, a rights campaigner said.
document.title: eleven killed as syrian funeral becomes protest
lines_and_colors: syrian security forces shot dead 11 mourners in the central city of homs on saturday at a mass funeral for people killed in the latest crackdown on protests against president bashar al-assad, a rights campaigner said.
